title: The game should change following the players, not viceversa
body:
Riot,
Soon it will be a season in which you refused to communicate with your community. 
You’re losing money, why don’t you just do what people really want so you can get all the money you lost so far?
Ethereals, star guardians, dmg/mobility creeps, TFT & Game Modes, ARAM Bans, Announcers, Grind Events and so on.
Don’t forget that when players will be tired of this, they will change game: a game should change according to players and not viceversa. It can happen sometimes, but now it’s getting boring.
Don’t forget that the higher you go, the harder you fall
